1.pT: Say what you want; famous games are usually fun

2.pT: It Feels Awesome to Gain a Bunch of Levels After a battle

3.pT: When a girl's your first friend, life feels like a date for a while

4.pT: Sometimes you conquer a dungeon only to find a strong boss back in your village

5.pT: The characters who become your friends after you clear a hard event usually have high stats

6.pT: Once you start speedrunning the minigames, you seriously can't stop

7.pT: When a mentor character becomes a boss, they'll push you to the edge

8.pT: There are some problems that cannot be solved only by low-level characters

9.pT: When you return to the first town with all your friends, new events will occur

10.pT: Multiplayer games have their own special appeal

11.pT: Sometimes just one option can change everything

12.pT: Items that can only be equipped on the heroine have special effects

13.pT: OVA 01: Post-Game Equipment for Girls Is a Little Different Than Usual

14.pT: OVA 02: Most Strange Spell Names Have Unknown Origins

1.pT: The best games make reconnaissance fun

2.pT: A happy ending doesn't mean this game is over

3.pT: Battles go better when you're fighting alongside someone whose signature move is the opposite of yours

4.pT: Villagers have their own way of life

5.pT: If you keep upgrading your initial equipment, it'll usually become your most powerful weapon

6.pT: Everyone has different expectations about a big event

7.pT: Important items are usually lying around in enchanted forests

8.pT: Sometimes the Main Character Can't Enter the Village of Another Species on His Own

9.pT: If You Don't Make Up Your Mind, the Story Won't Advance

10.pT: The Patterns Carved into the Stone Tablet are Connected to the Mysteries of the World

11.pT: Even Fairies Feel Lonely When They're Away from Their Spring by Themselves

12.pT: Sometimes the Ancient Tome in the First Town is the Key to the Final Dungeon

13.pT: You're Sure to Find What You Want on the Other Side of the Magic Door
